entry.title: NSDateFormatter And Finding World Time
entry.content: When I was writing an app of finding world time, I find a really interesting issue of NSDateFormatter.When we initialize a NSDate object, with [NSDate date], it’s GMT time, rather than the time depends on our local time zone; and when we wants to print the string of local time by using NSDateFormatter it will add the time difference between tour local time zone and the GMT time directly.
